section.heading: Exemptions from subchapter.
section.text: Nothing in this subchapter and §§ 43-119 and 43-125 shall be construed:

para.text: To prohibit funeral directors, licensed pursuant to §§ 3-405 and 3-406, from discharging their duties; or
To prohibit or affect in any way the authority, duties, rights, or obligations vested, imposed, or granted by Chapter 2 of Title 3.
